text: these rum raisin clusters take just a
few minutes to mix up and they are such
a treat and very impressive to look at
and to give all you need is six ounces
of a semi-sweet chocolate melted in the
microwave with two tablespoons about it
it takes maybe two minutes to get it all
melted together and looking nice and
shiny and beautiful - this one cup of
cornflakes any kind of crunchy dried
cereal would be great here this is
really that crunch you're gonna get when
you bite into this chocolate so whatever
you have that you like that you think
would be good a granola that would be
really good in here about one cup of
whatever cereal you want to use then
salt love salt and chocolate together
it'll just bring out all the flavors
eighth of a teaspoon of salt and now for
the rum raisins I have a cup of raisins
soaking in a third of a cup of a golden
rum you want to heat up the rum add the
raisins and let them clump if you don't
want to use alcohol you could just heat
them up in water or an orange juice or
apple juice anything like that could
also try a dried cherry any other dried
fruit would be good here as long as it's
about the size of a raisin I'm just
gonna drain off the rum we don't want
that liquid so make sure it all comes
off into the chocolate and that's it
this is the entire mixture only thing
left is the scooping I have a sheet pan
because these are going to have to go
into the refrigerator to get nice and
firm so I'm going to scoop them right
onto this parchment paper I have about a
one and a half inch scoop but whatever
you have is fine if you want to use a
tablespoon that'll work and then just
make them into nice little mounds if a
flake comes off just put it on top
because it will adhere in the
refrigerator make sure all those pieces
are snuggled together you can make them
bigger or smaller whatever you feel like
these are like an instant little candy
bar there's a last little touch before
you put them in the refrigerator
sprinkle on a coarse sea salt
this is a Maldon salt which is really
delicious this is really that final
beautiful little touch so I'm going to
put these into the refrigerator and then
we can box them up
okay our rum raisin clusters are all set
they're nice and firm so I'm gonna just
use these little cupcake liners fit them
into a box
they look very professional some will be
a little bit bigger than others so just
fit them in as they work this is a great
gift for a loved one anybody who likes
chocolate
a little bit of chew from the raisin and
the crunch from the cereal these are a
great treat and that's it they look so
good
